headline: U.S. Bancorp Q4 Earnings Beat on Y/Y Rise in Fee Income, Shares Fall
summary: USB beat on Q4 earnings on stronger fee income and lower expenses. However, its shares slip as higher credit-loss provisions offset solid revenue growth.

headline: Why U.S. Bancorp (USB) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does U.S. Bancorp (USB) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Why ServisFirst Bancshares Remains One Of My Preferred Regional Banks
summary: ServisFirst Bancshares, Inc. Q4/FY2025 results: 12% loan growth, higher net interest margin, and smart deposit strategy. Click for this SFBS earnings update.

headline: U.S. Bancorp (USB) Expands Capital Markets Reach With BTIG Deal
summary: U.S. Bancorp (NYSE:USB) is included on our list of the best undervalued wide moat stocks. On January 13, 2026, U.S. Bancorp (NYSE:USB) announced that it will acquire Wall Street brokerage BTIG for up to $1 billion in cash and stock. With this move, the company marks a strategic expansion into capital markets. In addition to […]

headline: USB Q4 Deep Dive: Deposit Growth, Payments Momentum, and BTIG Acquisition Shape 2026 Outlook
summary: Financial services giant U.S. Bancorp (NYSE:USB) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5% year on year to $7.36 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.26 per share was 6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
